mapper.select: select i.inspection_date,i.inspection_result, il.inspection_list_name, il.inspection_list_category, il.inspection_list_reference, u.user_name from inspections i, inspection_lists il, users u where i.INSPECTION_LIST_ID = il.INSPECTION_LIST_ID and i.INSPECTION_INSPECTOR_ID = u.USER_ID and i.INSPECTION_TREATMENT_ID = #{treatment_id}
